scripts.studio:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma studio
scripts.studio:local: npm run env:local -- npx prisma studio
scripts.db:dev:pull: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma db pull
scripts.db:local:push: npm run env:local -- npx prisma db push
scripts.migrate:dev:dev: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:dev:reset: npm run env:dev -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.migrate:local:dev: npm run env:local -- npx prisma migrate dev --name
scripts.migrate:local:reset: npm run env:local -- npx prisma migrate reset
